Package com.opera.core.systems.testing.drivers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TestDriver  
    TestDriverSupplier
    A driver supplier allows easy construction of differently configured OperaDriver's.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTestDriverSupplier
    Implements shared functionality across the various TestDriverSupplier implementations.
    MockOperaDriver
    A mocked OperaDriver for testing startup, shutdown and generally anything not related to the WebDriver specific implementation at all.
    TestDriverBuilder
    TestDriverBuilder is a builder that supplies you with instances of TestDriver through the TestDriverBuilder.get() method.
    TestOperaDesktopDriver  
    TestOperaDesktopDriverSupplier  
    TestOperaDriver
    Provides access to the OperaRunner, so we can detect crashes.
    TestOperaDriverSupplier  
    TestOperaMobileDriver  
    TestOperaMobileDriverSupplier
